why__call.title: Insured and Bonded
why__call.description: All Pierce County landscaping jobs are fully insured and bonded, guaranteeing that our clients are free from liability.

why__call.title: Licensed
why__call.description: We are fully licensed landscapers, ensuring legitimacy and peace of mind for our clients.

why__call.title: Reasonable price
why__call.description: We want our landscaping services to be accessible to everyone. That’s why we always try to keep our prices low and transparent.

why__call.title: Year-round service
why__call.description: Landscaping in Tacoma and around the whole county is important no matter the time of year - and we always get it done right

what__we_do__list.title: Lawn mowing and maintenance
what__we_do__list.description:
Tacoma landscaping wouldn't be complete without lawn care.
			We're experts at all the basics your grass requires.

what__we_do__list.title: Brush hogging and field mowing
what__we_do__list.description:
We have the tools necessary to mow in bulk and quickly and
            safely clear brush on the edges of your property.

what__we_do__list.title: Land clearing, tree and stump removal
what__we_do__list.description:
Pierce County landscaping often includes maintenance on
            the beautiful trees that cover our state. We’ve got you
            covered on all of that stuff, too.
what__we_do__list.img__alt: Land clearing, tree and stump removal

what__we_do__list.title: Gardening, weeding, bed work
what__we_do__list.description:
Need micro gardening tasks done? You got it. Our thumbs
            are greener than grass and we always pay attention to
            detail.

what__we_do__list.title: Hedge trimming
what__we_do__list.description:
Proper hedges are a Tacoma landscaping staple. We have the
            precision and expertise to keep yours looking top-notch
            year-round.

what__we_do__list.title: Beauty bark installation
what__we_do__list.description:
Class up your property with beauty bark and trust the eye
            of the style experts at Pierce Landscapers.

what__we_do__list.title: Blackberry bush removal
what__we_do__list.description:
Due to our climate, Tacoma landscaping often includes
            removing those pesky blackberry bushes. And we love the
            challenge.

what__we_do__list.title: Tree and hedge pruning
what__we_do__list.description:
Pruning is essential in keeping trees and hedges healthy.
            We’re experts is keeping what you need, and removing
            what’s holding your vegetation back.

what__we_do__list.title: Paving services
what__we_do__list.description:
We install lots of paved patios, outdoor fireplaces,
            walking paths, and more all around the county and beyond.

what__we_do__list.title: Forestry mulching
what__we_do__list.description:
Landscaping Pierce County’s forests requires strength,
            speed, and a deft touch - and we have all the tools
            necessary.

what__we_do__list.title: Gravel work
what__we_do__list.description:
Our gravel work is effective and stylish. Add walkways to
            your yard or complement nice-looking plants with some
            well-placed stones.

what__we_do__list.title: Patio building
what__we_do__list.description:
We’d love to build you a patio that makes your yard more
            “hangout spot” and less “wild west”. And we’ve done it all
            before.

what__we_do__list.title: Sprinkler system installation and maintenance
what__we_do__list.description:
Tacoma landscaping routines for lush lawns often include a
            steady water supply. We can get you going with a new
            sprinkler system, or help maintain the one you’ve got.

what__we_do__list.title: Fireplace and firepit installation
what__we_do__list.description:
Nothing brings comfort to a backyard like s’mores and an
            open fire. We install firepits like the best of them, no
            matter what your yard looks like.
what__we_do__list.img__alt: Marshmallows roasting over a fire pit

what__we_do__list.title: Retaining wall construction
what__we_do__list.description:
Retaining walls can be crucial elements of up-kept
            Washington State yards due to the state’s hilly landscape.
            Ours are always strong, long-lasting, and easy on the eye.

verified__testimonials.author: Harley Ludwig
verified__testimonials.testimonial__text:
Can do anything you need! No job too big or too small!
			Excellent customer service and very friendly! Will be a lifelong
			customer!

verified__testimonials.author: Savannah Robinson
verified__testimonials.testimonial__text:
Just got into a new house with a large yard that needed a lot of help. Jonathan came and helped us create and envision the
			yard we wanted. Him and his guys were respectful and took their
			time to really make our yard look amazing. This will defiantly
			be the company who I will go back to for any yard care needs.

verified__testimonials.author: Jaime Camacho
verified__testimonials.testimonial__text:
Work is always done with care and the price is very reasonable given the size of the yard. He takes his time and does a
			fantastic job. I would HIGHLY recommend his services. Great guy
			who does great work with care.

verified__testimonials.author: Teya Thomas
verified__testimonials.testimonial__text:
Very professional, got the job done with no hassles and the price was very reasonable. I would definitely recommend Pierce
			Landscapers and will call on them again.

verified__testimonials.author: Shawnta Smith
verified__testimonials.testimonial__text:
Thank you so much to the Pierce Landscapers crew. I am so pleased with all of the extra time they put into the services I
			needed provided. I would highly recommend this company and will
			absolutely be a returning customer

verified__testimonials.author: Scott Wade
verified__testimonials.testimonial__text:
I have been using Jonathon and his landscaping business for 3 years. He is extremely professional always on time and takes
			great pride in his work. I have used his company for Lawn
			maintenance, pruning, and yard clean up as well as other
			services. I would highly recommend his services to anyone
			looking for a man that is trust worthy on time and takes great
			pride in his work.

verified__testimonials.author: Nabil
verified__testimonials.testimonial__text: They always help me with my yard on my property in Tacoma. Affordable rates and excellent job 👏
